description:
Stop data brokers from exposing your information. Go to my sponsor https://aura.com/SOG to get a 14-day free trial and see how much of yours is being sold

Hello guys and gals, it's me Mutahar again! This time we take a look at the oldest version of North Korea's own homegrown Operating System, Red Star OS. This version copies the identity of Windows XP and serves as a great insight into the censorship and internet practices of North Korea. Thanks for watching!
Like, Comment and Subscribe for more videos!
title: Diving Into North Korea's Windows XP (it spies on you)...
